column4: hi - I'm getting to like gnome-do alot - however still running hardy which has a default 0.4 version - anyone running 0.6 on hardy?
using .04 on hardy - want to upgrade gnome do so I can use the funky plugins
I'm not planning on upgrading my lappy to intrepid yet - I've got her just so and tweaking just a bit :-)
okay. and what is exactly wrong?
nothing wrong - just want to know if anyone has upgraded to the latest gnome-do on hardy and how they went about it?
ah right, you are aware the maintain an externel repo right? I personally had no problems when using hardy and the externel repo
lemme dredge up the link for you
any instructions on how to go about it?
you add the ppa to your /etc/apt/sources.list. Do you know how to do that?
google did not bring that one up
